koohiiStory1: The gates are too big to be closed by man. Only a genie can. "Close sesame!".
koohiiStory2: Alright none of you GENIUSES could figure out how the door is CLOSED, so I invented these. They are called the SALOON DOORS. With these, you don't need to.
kunYomi: と.じる、と.ざす、し.める、し.まる、た.てる
readingExamples: 閉まる (し.まる), 閉める (し.める), 閉ざす (と.ざす), 閉じる (と.じる)
words: close (e.g. book, eyes, meeting, etc.), shut
